about_the_game: "Did someone drop some sick beats in here? No, seriously, I wanna know!" Personally endorsed by former child star Gary Coleman himself, the POSTAL 2 Official Soundtrack delivers all of the classic Krotch-tastic muzak heard around the town of Paradise, including two hits from the bands Wrythe and A Fall To Break!

content_descriptors.notes: soundtrack for POSTAL which is rated M for mature

detailed_description: "Did someone drop some sick beats in here? No, seriously, I wanna know!" legal_notice: Running With Scissors develops and publishers outrageous games just for the hell of it.  POSTAL 2<sup>TM, POSTAL 2: Apocalypse Weekend<sup>TM</sup>, The POSTAL Dude<sup>TM</sup>, Champ<sup>TM</sup>, Krotchy<sup>TM</sup>,and Running With Scissors<sup>SM</sup> are Trademarks and Service Marks of RWS, Inc.</sup>
